body:
Hey guys! So I finally got a chance to record another gameplay video with commentary, and in this video, I'll just be rushing and breaking monuments. Enjoy!

http://youtu.be/RkD_qAxpcCw


Edit: Lol I just realized I didn't cut the song at the end .-.

replies.body:
Hey!

TIP: Go to Video Settings and active View Bobbing: ON
(:

replies.body: I killed 3-4 people w/o armor defending you the first monument, then 5 with armor (leather) when you were breaking the second...until they just gave up and ran past me instead of trying XD.
